maqras.text: Shiko no okata, anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
Kare wa sozo shi, totonoe chowa sa seru okata
mata kare wa,-ho o sadamete michibiki
bokuya o gen wa sa reru okata
Sore kara, asaguroku kareta karikabu ni nasa reru
Ware wa, anata ni dokuju sa seru yo ni shita. Sorede anata wa wasurenaidearou
Arra no o nozomi ga nai kagiri wa. Hontoni kare wa, arawareta mono to kakureta mono o shitte ora reru
Ware wa anata ni (michi o) heitan de, an'i ni surudearou
Dakara kunkai shi nasai. Kunkai wa (kiku mono ni) yakudatsu
Kunkai wa,-nushi o osoreru mono ni ukeire rareyou
Daga mottomo fukona mono wa, sore o yokerudearou
Kare wa kyodaina hono de yaka reyou
Sono Chu de, shini mo, iki mo shinai
Daga mizukara kiyometa mono wa kanarazu hae
kare no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi, reihai o mamoru
Iya, anata gata wa gense no seikatsu no kata o konomu
Raise ga motto sugure, mata motto eien'na monodearunoni
Kore wa hontoni, mukashi no keiten ni ari
iburahimu ya musa no keiten ni mo aru
Attoteki (jitai no) shosoku ga, anata ni tasshita ka
(Aru mono no) kao wa sonohi unadare
honeori tsukare kitte
moesakaru goku hi de yaka re
nietagiru sensui o nomasa reru
Kare-ra ni wa nigai ibara no soto ni, shokumotsu wa naku
soreha eiyo ni mo narazu, ue mo iyasenai
(Soto no aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi kanki shi
kare-ra wa doryoku shite kokoro michi tari
takai rakuen no naka ni 置Ri
sokode, munashi (kotoba) o kikanai
Soko ni wa, nagareru izumi ga ari
takaku age rareta (ikai no) nedoko ga ari
taihai ga sonae rare
shitone wa suretsu ni narabe rare
shikimono ga shikitsume rarete iru
Kare-ra wa 骼駝 Ni tsuite, ikaga ni tsukura reta ka o kangaete minai no ka
Mata ten ni tsuite, ikaga ni takaku kakage rareta ka
mata yamayama ni tsuite, ikaga ni suetsuke rarete iru ka
mata daichi ni tsuite, ikaga ni hiroge rarete iru ka o
Dakara anata wa kunkai shi nasai. Hontoni anata wa hitori no kunkai-sha nihokanaranai
Kare-ra no tame no, shihai-shade wanai
Daga dare demo, somuki satte shinko o kyohi surunaraba
arra wa saidai no chobatsu de kare-ra o bassa reru
Hontoni ware no moto ni, kare-ra wa kaeri kuru nodearu
Kare-ra no seisan wa, hontoni ware no nindearu
Akatsuki ni oite
yoru ni oite
gusu to kisu ni oite
Sariyuku yoru ni oite (chikau)
Hontoni kono nakaniha, bunbetsu aru mono e no chikai ga arude wanai ka
Anata wa arra ga, ikaga ni ado (no min) o shobun sa reta ka o kangaenai no ka
enchu no narabitatsu iramu (no miyako) no koto o
kore ni ruisuru mono wa, sono kuni ni oite tsukura reta koto wa nakattade wanai ka
Mata tanima no iwa ni horikonda samudo (no min) ya
kui nonushi firuaun (no koto o kangaenai no ka)
Korera wa (subete), sono kuni ni oite ho o koeta-sha-tachi de
sono ji ni jaaku o zocho sa seta
Sorede anata no omo wa, chobatsu no muchi o kare-ra ni abisekake rareta
Hontoni anata no omo wa kanshi no to ni ora reru
Sate ningen wa omo ga o kokoromi no tame, kandai ni sa re megumi o sadzuke rareru to, kare wa,`-nushi wa, watashi ni kandaide ara remasu.' To iu
Daga kare o kokoromi, onmegumi o herasa reru toki wa,`-nushi wa watashi o, keishi nasaimasu.' To iu
Danjite ikenai. Iya, anata gata wa minashigo o taisetsu ni shinai
Mata hinja o yashinau tame ni, tagaini hagemasanai
Shikamo isan o toriage, goyoku o hoshi 尽 Ni suru
Mata anata gata wa, hogaina ai de zaisan o aisuru
Danjite ikenai. Daichi ga konagona ni kudaka reru toki
nushi wa, retsu mata retsu no tenshi (o shitagae), rairin nasa reru
Mata jigoku wa, sonohi (manoatari ni) hakoba re, sonohi ningen wa hansei surudearou. Daga hansei shita tote, doshite kare no tame ni narou ka
Kare wa,`a , watashi no (shorai no) seimei no tame ni,(zenko o) takuwaete itanaraba.' To gen'u
Sorede sonohi, dare mo nashi enai hodo no chobatsu o kuwae rare
mata dare mo kosoku shi enai hodo ni sokubaku nasa reru
(Zenko o tsunda tamashi ni iwa rerudearou. ) O, anshin, taigo shite iru tamashi yo
anata no omo ni kaere, kanki shi o man'etsu ni azukatte
Anata wa, waga shimo be no naka ni ire
Anata wa, waga rakuen ni ire
